paper_abstract: We propose in this study a numerically accurate and computationally efficient convectiondiffusionreaction finite difference scheme to discretize the full-vector and semi-vector optical waveguide equations. The scheme formulated in a grid stencil of five nodal points for solving the three-dimensional waveguide equations employs the locally analytic solution. In this three-dimensional study, calculations were carried out for the investigation of wave propagation in diffused channel, rectangular and rib types of optical waveguide. Copyright (C) 2011 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
paper_title: Development of a convection-diffusion-reaction model for solving Maxwell's equations in frequency domain
